Systems:

ULTRA

SHOCK AND AWE

The Ultra takes two separate turns each round. They regain spent reactions each time they take a turn.
If the Ultra is facing five or more hostile characters when combat begins, the Ultra takes a third turn each round.

DEADLY

The Ultra deals +1d6 damage on critical hits.

JUGGERNAUT

At the start of the Ultra’s turn, they clear one condition. At the end of their turn, they repair one destroyed weapon or system.

REINFORCED

The Ultra gains +3 Structure and +3 Stress.

LEGENDARY

The Ultra rolls all structure damage and overheating checks twice and chooses either result.

RESILIENT

The Ultra gains +5 HP.

REFLEX

The Ultra can Overwatch unlimited times per round.

FORTRESS

The Ultra gains +3 Accuracy on Systems saves, and tech attacks against them receive +3 difficulty.

HOVER PROPULSION

The Ultra can hover when they move or Boost.

REPULSION FIELD

When hostile characters start their turn adjacent to the Ultra or become adjacent to the Ultra for the first time on their turn, they take {2/4/6} Energy damage + 2 heat and must succeed on a Systems save or become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

VETERAN

SLIPPERY

The Veteran’s standard moves ignore engagement and don’t provoke reactions.

RAINMAKER

MISSILE PODS

This weapon can attack 1-3 characters at a time.

JAVELIN ROCKETS // ENDLESS RAIN

The Rainmaker chooses 6 free spaces within line of sight and range 20 that are not adjacent to each other. All characters know which spaces have been chosen. The Rainmaker fires a volley of auto-targeting rockets into the air: the next time a hostile character moves through, starts their turn in, or passes above one of the chosen spaces – no more than 10 spaces up – they are hit by a rocket, taking {5/6/7} kinetic damage. Each space can only be triggered once.
This effect lasts until the start of the Rainmaker’s next turn.

HUNTSMAN

Against characters with Lock On, the Rainmaker’s weapons gain Smart, Seeking, and AP.

ATLAS MISSILES

The Rainmaker chooses a space of ground in line of sight and Range 30, obvious to all characters with line of sight to the space. The Rainmaker launches a missile that lands at the end of the next round making a Blast 2 explosion; affected characters take {16/20/24} Explosive damage, half if they pass an Agility save.

HADES MISSILES

All characters in a Cone 3 area starting within range 20 of the Rainmaker take {4/6/8} Energy damage and 2 heat, half if they pass an Agility save. This system doesn’t need line of sight, just a possible route to the target.

ACE

MISSILE LAUNCHER

No description given.

BARREL ROLL

Trigger: A melee or ranged attack hits the Ace.
The Ace performs a barrel roll, flying 6 spaces in any direction and causing the attack to miss. This movement ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions.

MISSILE SWARM

This weapon deals double damage to characters with Lock On and doesn’t affect allied characters.

CHAFF LAUNCHERS

After using Barrel Roll, the Ace counts as being in soft cover until the end of their next turn; additionally, Barrel Roll can be used against tech attacks.
